languages.text: {n}Улыбка сползает с губ юного служителя. Он возмущенно выдыхает:{/n} "Ну да... лекториум я прогуливал... но я — настоящий дворянин! Клянусь честью!"

{n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка сползает с губ юного служителя. Он возмущенно выдыхает:{/n} "Ну да... лекториум я прогуливал... но я — настоящий дворянин! Клянусь честью!"

{n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

languages.text: {n}年轻牧师脸上的笑容烟消云散，他愤怒地喘息起来。{/n}“为什么……好吧，没错，我确实逃掉过一两次布道，这是真的……但我依然是如假包换的贵族！我以我的荣誉起誓！”
languages.original_text: {n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻牧师脸上的笑容烟消云散，他愤怒地喘息起来。{/n}“为什么……好吧，没错，我确实逃掉过一两次布道，这是真的……但我依然是如假包换的贵族！我以我的荣誉起誓！”

languages.text: {n}若者の顔から笑みが消えた。彼は息をのみ、それから憤慨した。{/n}「なっ…まあ、確かに、講義を一度か二度サボったことはありますけど…それでも私はれっきとした貴族です！この身の名誉にかけて誓います！」
languages.original_text: {n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}若者の顔から笑みが消えた。彼は息をのみ、それから憤慨した。{/n}「なっ…まあ、確かに、講義を一度か二度サボったことはありますけど…それでも私はれっきとした貴族です！この身の名誉にかけて誓います！」

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa se esfuma del rostro del joven, que resopla indignado:{/n} «Pues... bueno, sí, me salté algún que otro lectorium, es cierto... ¡pero mi sangre sigue siendo legítimamente noble! ¡Lo juro por mi honor!».
languages.original_text: {n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa se esfuma del rostro del joven, que resopla indignado:{/n} «Pues... bueno, sí, me salté algún que otro lectorium, es cierto... ¡pero mi sangre sigue siendo legítimamente noble! ¡Lo juro por mi honor!».

languages.text: {n}Küçük rahibin suratındaki gülümseme kayboluyor, öfkeyle nefesini tutuyor.{/n} "Neden... Şey, evet, birkaç kez lektoryuma gelmekten kaçındığım doğrudur... Yine de ben düzgün bir soyluyum! Şerefim üzerine yemin ederim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Küçük rahibin suratındaki gülümseme kayboluyor, öfkeyle nefesini tutuyor.{/n} "Neden... Şey, evet, birkaç kez lektoryuma gelmekten kaçındığım doğrudur... Yine de ben düzgün bir soyluyum! Şerefim üzerine yemin ederim!"

languages.text: {n}Le sourire s'efface du visage du jeune homme qui s'étrangle d'indignation :{/n} « Eh bien... oui, j'ai manqué une ou deux fois les cours du lectorium, c'est vrai... Mais je n'en suis pas moins un vrai noble ! Je le jure sur mon honneur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire s'efface du visage du jeune homme qui s'étrangle d'indignation :{/n} « Eh bien... oui, j'ai manqué une ou deux fois les cours du lectorium, c'est vrai... Mais je n'en suis pas moins un vrai noble ! Je le jure sur mon honneur ! »

languages.text: {n}Das Lächeln verschwindet aus dem Gesicht des jungen Mannes. Er schnappt empört nach Luft. {/n}"Nun ... also gut, ich habe ein- oder zweimal das Lectorium geschwänzt, das stimmt ... Aber dennoch bin ich ein echter Adeliger! Das schwöre ich bei meiner Ehre!"
languages.original_text: {n}The smile vanishes from the young man's face. He gasps indignantly,{/n} "Why... well, yes, I did skip the lectorium once or twice, it's true... But I am still a proper noble! I swear it on my honour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Lächeln verschwindet aus dem Gesicht des jungen Mannes. Er schnappt empört nach Luft. {/n}"Nun ... also gut, ich habe ein- oder zweimal das Lectorium geschwänzt, das stimmt ... Aber dennoch bin ich ein echter Adeliger! Das schwöre ich bei meiner Ehre!"
